querystring.select: SELECT la.FULL_ASSET_NAME AS FullAssetName, vrm1.DESCR AS AssetCondition, la.MANUFACTURING_YEAR AS ManufacturingYear, la.ASSET_PRICE_AMT AS AssetPriceAmt, vrm2.DESCR AS DownPaymentType, la.DOWN_PAYMENT_AMT AS DownPaymentAmt
querystring.from: From dbo.LEAD_ASSET la LEFT JOIN V_REF_MASTER vrm1 ON vrm1.MASTER_CODE = la.MR_ASSET_CONDITION_CODE AND vrm1.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'ASSET_CONDITION' LEFT JOIN V_REF_MASTER vrm2 ON vrm2.MASTER_CODE = la.MR_DOWN_PAYMENT_TYPE_CODE   AND vrm2.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'DOWN_PAYMENT_TYPE'
